about.title: About
about.description1: Super Mock is an innovative AI platform that revolutionizes the process of preparing for technical interviews. We combine cutting-edge artificial intelligence technologies with multilingual support to create a personalized learning experience.
about.description2: Our platform helps candidates improve their programming, communication, and problem-solving skills through realistic interview simulations with AI analysis and real-time feedback.

page.name: Korobkov Maxim Viktorovich
page.subtitle: Creator of SuperMock ‚Äî an innovative platform for interview preparation using artificial intelligence
page.projectSubtitle: Unique platform for personalized IT profession learning
page.principlesText: Many IT courses are not live, they are not individual. Every person is special and everyone is different, there are no identical people, which means the principle in learning should be special and personal for everyone.
page.authorIntro: My name is Korobkov Maxim Viktorovich and I am a developer with 20 years of experience, started with automated trading systems on financial exchanges, currently designing systems for company needs.
page.problemDescription: I get many ideas in life from problems I encounter, and as a developer I try to solve them. Time is the most valuable thing in our life, I faced the problem that a lot of time is spent on learning. I studied in four companies, this experience is known to me, they all try to solve problems, but many of their students leave unsatisfied.
page.solutionTitle: Solution to the problem in approach:
page.solutionText: The most important thing we go to is the goal, but while we go to it we already forget what we went through or learned. Is this familiar to you? I think yes, everyone is familiar with this... So what's the solution then? Let's not just teach to memorize, but also live, immerse ourselves in the good sense of understanding this word :)
page.experienceDescription: Imagine even if you are already a pro and have achieved something in IT. You are a junior and burn to enter IT and earn a lot of money remotely drinking juice on the seashore, working on a MacBook... But, there is one "BUT" ‚Äî employers don't take even if there is a response, into their successful society, you don't fit, live coding failed or answered incorrectly, few projects no commercial experience.
page.ideaText: Create a service where everything is in one place and there is your personal mentor ‚Äî a real friend even if it's AI! Imagine, you learned some basics on the platform, and then the mentor tells you: "Are you ready, let's go to a mock interview, pass it I will look at the feedback and further from this I will guide you, fill the gaps in your knowledge".
page.learningDescription: You pass interviews, get used to communication and confidently speak with the interviewer, not as before with a trembling voice or praying that the connection would disappear and get out of this hell :) In general, learning goes with joy because it is made for you and configured for you.
page.conclusion: This is the system I developed specifically for you. Pass interviews communicating with colleagues, pay a reasonable amount for learning as a sign of gratitude for supporting the project.
page.featuresSubtitle: What makes SuperMock a unique platform
page.feature1: Personal AI mentor for each user
page.feature3: Adaptive learning based on your gaps
page.feature4: Development of both technical and soft skills

hero.title: SuperMock Help
hero.subtitle: Step-by-step guide to using the platform for interview practice

steps.title: Step-by-step
steps.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start practicing interviews

step1.title: Click the SuperMock button
step1.details: Go to the main page and click the 'Start Learning' button to enter the system

step2.title: Choose a profession
step2.description: Specify the area you want to practice in
step2.details: Choose from the list of available professions the one that matches your learning goals

step3.title: Choose a role
step3.details: Decide on the role: whether you want to practice as a candidate or as an interviewer

step4.title: Find an interview
step4.description: The system will find a suitable partner
step4.details: Our system will automatically find a suitable partner for you to practice with

step5.title: Conduct the interview
step5.details: Conduct a full interview using the built-in video call

step6.title: Leave feedback
step6.description: Rate your partner and get a rating
step6.details: After the interview, leave constructive feedback and get a rating from your partner

tip1.title: Be polite and professional
tip1.description: Follow business etiquette and treat your partner with respect

tip2.title: Leave constructive feedback
tip2.description: Help your partner improve their skills by providing useful recommendations

tip3.title: Practice regularly
tip3.description: For better results, dedicate time to practice on a regular basis
